### Overview

SkipShuffle is a simple and minimalist music player for Android.

## Features

* Simple, minimalist interface.

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/screenshot1.png)

* Can switch between big player and list view mode.

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/list_view.png)

* Works across most phones and tablet from Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) and up.

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/tablet.png)

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/phone.png)

* Customize the look and feel with over 16 different themes.

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/themes.png)

* Control from the notification area

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/notification.png)

* Control widget for all Android versions and

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/control_widget.png)

* lock screen widget for Android 4.4 and up.

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/lock_screen_widget.png)

* Available in many languages (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Arabic, Greek, Hindi, Japanese, Russian and Simplified Chinese)*.

![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/en.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/fr.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/es.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/pt.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/it.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/de.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/ar.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/el.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/hi.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/ja.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/ru.png)
![Screenshot media player](/art/readme/zh.png)


** If you find mistakes in any of the translations or if you are a native speaker of a missing language
 and want to provide additional support, please let me by [sending me an email](mailto:ever.livin.never.fearful@gmail.com).

### Download

You can install it free of charge from the [Google Play store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dontbelievethebyte.sk1pshuffle).

Alternative direct download and changelog, version :

[9023](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9023.apk) - **Jan 10, 2015**

* Reduced the size of images.

[9022](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9022.apk) - **Jan 8, 2015**

* High res images for xxhdpi and xxxhdpi devices.

[9021](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9021.apk) - **Jan 7, 2015**

* Control widget and lock screen widget for Android 4.4 and up!

[9020](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9020.apk) - **Dec 29, 2014**

* Seekbar fix, play button long click track summary, new themes.

[9019](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9019.apk) - **Dec 29, 2014**

* Bug fixes

[9018](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9018.apk) - **Dec 29, 2014**

* Added new seek bar feature.

[9017](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9018.apk) - **Dec 28, 2014**

* Better shuffle behavior, re-shuffle on long clicks.

[9016](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9018.apk) - **Dec 28, 2014**

* Better list navigation : On long click events, scrolls back to the current playlist position.

[9015](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9014.apk) - **Dec 23, 2014**

* Lightweight more performant themes. New Xmas theme!

[9014](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9014.apk) - **Dec 19, 2014**

* Rate/review on Google Play from inside the app.

[9013](http://dontbelievethebyte.github.io/assets/skipshuffle/skipshuffle-release-9013.apk) - **Dec 19, 2014**

* Added 10 language translations.

9012 - **Dec 19, 2014**

* Added missing strings.

9011 - **Dec 19, 2014**

* Added French translation.

9010 - **Dec 18, 2014**

* First public release.

9009 (beta) - **Dec 18, 2014**

* SMS and play states audio focus fix.

*  Wakelock mode (needs new permission).

*  Can control play/pause with headset button.

9008 (beta) - **Dec 16, 2014**

* Manage audio stream focus to play nice with other apps.

9007 (beta) - **Dec 15, 2014**

* Animation tweak

9006 (beta) - **Dec 11, 2014**

* Layout improvements (buttons size and positioning, action bar behaviour not hiding interface).

9005 (beta) - **Dec 2, 2014**

* Haptic feedback from heuristic.

9004 (beta) - **Dec 1, 2014**

* Fixed Proguard bug that was messing with reflection.

9003 (beta) - **Dec 1, 2014**

* Notification fix, layout and update on orientation.

* Fixed shuffle behaviour bug.

9002 (beta) - **Nov 26, 2014**

* Bug fixes

9001 (beta) - **Nov 25, 2014**

* First beta release.
